properties.entry: SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , AUTHOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_RATE , BOOK_IMG FROM BOOK ORDER BY BOOK_NAME
SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , AUTHOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_RATE , BOOK_IMG FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY BOOK_NAME
SELECT BOOK_ID , BOOK_NAME , AUTHOR , PUBLICATION_DATE , PUBLISHER , SALE_RATE , BOOK_IMG FROM BOOK WHERE AUTHOR LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY BOOK_NAME
